description:
Good, app. Does what I ask it to do.
Only the hardcoded elementary style is a downside for me as a gnome/adwita user
summary: Good app, nice style but not coherent with mine..

description:
Broken / incomplete

File open -> cancel fails
Proper test DOT file does not render
No instructions or help

Didn't work, sadly. All text was rendered as boxes, as if it were Unicode that I lacked a font for, but was running on a full Debian Buster GNOME desktop system. If this could be fixed I'd be happy to change my review.
summary: All text is rectangles on Debian Buster

description: Pretty simple and straightforward interface. I opened a small DOT file and it rendered it easily.
